title: Requiring the Temporary President of the Senate to appoint a two person committee to inform the Governor the Senate is ready to proceed with business
fulltext:
SENATE  RESOLUTION  resolved  that  the  Temporary  President  appoint a
Committee of two to inform the Governor  of  the  election  of  Dean  G.
Skelos as Temporary President of the Senate for the years 2011-2012, and
that the Senate is organized and ready to proceed with business

RESOLVED,  That  the  Temporary  President  appoint  a  Committee of two
comprised of Senator Patricia Ritchie and Senator Timothy  Kennedy,  for
the  purpose of informing the Governor of the election of Dean G. Skelos
as Temporary President of the Senate for the years 2011-2012,  and  that
the Senate is organized and ready to proceed with business.
